worker_notes: Cargo.toml already had the [[bin]] entry for battle_editor. Had to add depth_slice: None to RenderPassColorAttachment (wgpu 27 API). All tests in asset_editor module pass. Used AutoVsync for editor (vs Immediate in arena) since editor doesn't need max FPS.

iteration_history.action: Created all files: battle_editor.rs, asset_editor/mod.rs, updated game/mod.rs. First cargo check failed due to missing depth_slice field in wgpu 27 RenderPassColorAttachment.
Added depth_slice: None to RenderPassColorAttachment. Both binaries now compile successfully.

learnings: wgpu 27 requires depth_slice field in RenderPassColorAttachment (not present in earlier versions)
Cargo.toml already had the battle_editor binary entry from project scaffolding
